title: Great Smoky Mountains National Park: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia      WebCams Two webcams provide a current view of the park and information about air quality conditions. Images are updated every 15 minutes.   Look Rock (located on the western end of the park) Purchase  Knob (located on the eastern end of the park)          Videos Watch short videos on a variety of topics including white-nose syndrome in bats, elk reintroduction, hemlock woolly adelgids, and more. The Great Smoky Mountains Association, a non-profit partner of the park, offers hundreds of beautiful videos about the Smokies on their YouTube channel.        Photo Galleries
